aircraft.value: Venom Attack - AC-5077-677 at Regional Depot-B

defect_observed.value: Pump cavitation noise observed. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Brake System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 30/10/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 31/10/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 04/11/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 02/11/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 04/11/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Pump cavitation noise observed. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Brake System component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
